title: Long Sarong, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Textile, probably a sarong, of dark red ground with blue plaid all-over design showing small pattern of metallic embroidery. Wide border shows geometric lattice design.

Long Sarong, 19th century.Medium: silk, metallic threads
